title: Find String Median
description: Write a function that returns the median of elements in a list after sorting it. If the list has an even number of elements, return the list sorted. If odd, return the middle element.
prompt:
from typing import List, Union

def median(l: List[int]) -> Union[int, List[int]]:
    """Return median of elements in the list l.
    >>> median([3, 1, 2, 4, 5])
    3
    >>> median([-10, 4, 6, 1000, 10, 20])
    [1, 4, 6, 10, 20, 1000]
    """
    pass
test_code:
def test_median():
    assert median([3, 1, 2, 4, 5]) == 3
    assert median([-10, 4, 6, 1000, 10, 20]) == [1, 4, 6, 10, 20, 1000]
    assert median([5]) == 5
    assert median([6, 5]) == [5, 6]
    assert median([8, 1, 3, 9, 9, 2, 7]) == 7
